InteropTopicSubcrFilter.name: InteropTopicSubcrFilter
InteropTopicSubcrFilter.description: Represents the subscriber's criteria for filtering the interoperability topic subscription event.

InteropTopicSubscriptionId.description: The interoperability topic subscription to which the filter is applied.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription filter record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription filter record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic subscription filter record.

OperatorType.description: Specifies the type of operator that applies to the filter.

QueryOperatorType.description: Specifies the type of query operator that applies to the filter.
